description: Retrieves a paginated list of gateways.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return for each paginated request. Default: 50

nested_items.name: gatewaySummaries
nested_items.description: A list that summarizes each gateway.

nested_items.name: gatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the gateway device.

nested_items.name: gatewayName
nested_items.description: The name of the gateway.

nested_items.name: gatewayPlatform
nested_items.description: Contains a gateway's platform information.

nested_items.name: greengrass
nested_items.description: A gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass.

nested_items.name: groupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Greengrass group. For more information about how to find a group's ARN, see ListGroups and GetGroup in the IoT Greengrass V1 API Reference.

nested_items.name: greengrassV2
nested_items.description: A gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass V2.

nested_items.name: coreDeviceThingName
nested_items.description: The name of the IoT thing for your IoT Greengrass V2 core device.

nested_items.name: coreDeviceOperatingSystem
nested_items.description: The operating system of the core device in IoT Greengrass V2.

nested_items.name: siemensIE
nested_items.description: A SiteWise Edge gateway that runs on a Siemens Industrial Edge Device.

nested_items.name: iotCoreThingName
nested_items.description: The name of the IoT Thing for your SiteWise Edge gateway.

nested_items.name: gatewayVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the gateway. A value of 3 indicates an MQTT-enabled, V3 gateway, while 2 indicates a Classic streams, V2 gateway.

nested_items.name: gatewayCapabilitySummaries
nested_items.description: A list of gateway capability summaries that each contain a namespace and status. Each gateway capability defines data sources for the gateway. To retrieve a capability configuration's definition, use DescribeGatewayCapabilityConfiguration.

nested_items.name: capabilityNamespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the capability configuration. For example, if you configure OPC-UA sources from the IoT SiteWise console, your OPC-UA capability configuration has the namespace iotsitewise:opcuacollector:version, where version is a number such as 1.

nested_items.name: capabilitySyncStatus
nested_items.description: The synchronization status of the capability configuration. The sync status can be one of the following:
IN_SYNC --- The gateway is running the capability configuration.

NOT_APPLICABLE --- Synchronization is not required for this capability configuration. This is most common when integrating partner data sources, because the data integration is handled externally by the partner.
OUT_OF_SYNC --- The gateway hasn't received the capability configuration.
SYNC_FAILED --- The gateway rejected the capability configuration.
UNKNOWN --- The synchronization status is currently unknown due to an undetermined or temporary error.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date the gateway was created, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date the gateway was last updated, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
